entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -43.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 08:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -43.0°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -47.0°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 45 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 45 this morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 62. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 65 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
